channel.title: Datasets on The Flow

item.title: Geocoordinates for Postcal Codes
item.description: The dataset is being hosted on GitHub: datumorphism/geonames-postal-codes-geocoordinates. The data is from geonames. Several columns have been dropped to simplify the dataset. How was the data regenerated Download the allCountries.zip from https://download.geonames.org/export/zip/ Unzip the data and place the file allCountries.txt into the folder raw. Transform the data using the python script/parse.py. Validate the results using python test/quality.py Missing Values in allCountries.zip
